swiftsolutions.taskscheduler.branchandboundastarparallel

Class BBAAlgorithmParallelVisual.RecursiveBBA

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinTask<java.lang.Void>
      • java.util.concurrent.RecursiveAction
        • swiftsolutions.taskscheduler.branchandboundastarparallel.BBAAlgorithmParallelVisual.RecursiveBBA
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Void>
    Enclosing class:
    BBAAlgorithmParallelVisual

    private class BBAAlgorithmParallelVisual.RecursiveBBA
extends java.util.concurrent.RecursiveAction
    This inner class encapsulates all of the core logic of the BBA* algorithm, including pruning such as FTO pruning. It executes the recursive nature of the algorithm in parallel, by delegating each recursive call (which stores state for a given free task/processor combination) to worker threads (running across multiple cores) as typical of a 'work stealing' algorithm. All thread management is done automatically.
